content.question:
Bars of initially unmagnetized iron and unmagnetized aluminum are placed in a strong magnetic field directed to the right, as shown in the middle figure. Iron is ferromagnetic, while aluminum is paramagnetic. After leaving the two bars in the field for a long time, the field is removed. Which of the following correctly represents the orientation of the magnetic dipoles inside each of the samples?
IronAluminumABCD

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
